name: Feature 072: Project fuzzy search in unified switcher
description: User Story 3: Type ':nix' in workspace mode to fuzzy match projects (e.g., nixos, nix-config)

actions.description: Clean slate: Kill all existing windows

notes: User Story 3: After typing ':', additional characters should trigger fuzzy project search
Manual test: Enter workspace mode, type ':nix', verify preview shows fuzzy matches
Expected preview after ':nix': type='project', accumulated_chars='nix', matched_project='nixos' (or other match), project_icon='üìÅ'
Fuzzy matching should use existing project registry from Feature 057
Performance target: <100ms from keystroke to matched_project update
Edge cases: ':non' (no match), ':' (empty query), ':123' (digits after colon)
Note: This test validates the clean slate. Actual fuzzy search requires manual validation or daemon keystroke simulation.
Architecture: Project fuzzy search handled by existing render_project_preview() in preview_renderer.py (reuses Feature 057 infrastructure)
